attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned believe that the MOD and the British Govenment have totally failed in their duty of care to Marine A, who, having seen many of his comrades in arms killed and maimed, did what he had been trained to do when he shot and killed an enemy combatant. We petition for his full pardon, and re-enstatement in the Royal Marines without loss or rank, seniority, pay, or entitlements.
